name: DDice - GMTK22
description:
A weird and fun crossover between Tetris and a dungeon crawler game.

This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 ! The game was made in GDevelop and some feature were made using a custom extension coded in javascript.

How to play ?

How to play : 

You can place a die which as a starting number and rolls down the path (board/grid). The die circle through the numbers from 1 to 6. (yes it's a weird die but it's magic)

 Meanwhile on the board, Orcs spawns and go up the board to steal the treasure. You have 3 lives which means that 3 Orcs stealing your treasure causes game over. 

 You have two main goals : 

- Put dice on the grid to roll over Orcs.

- Make pairs of dice that are the same value

 You'll have to think about where to roll the die so it can roll on an orc and land with the matching number next to another die.
